      • setCurrentMove

        public void setCurrentMove(int isWhite)
        Set which color is currently moving Precondition: isWhite is either 0 or 1
        Parameters:
        isWhite - If white is moving, isWhite should equal 1, else black is moving and isWhite should equal 0 to signify false

      • getCurrentMove

        public boolean getCurrentMove()
        Tells is the current move is white or not
        Returns:
        true if current move is white, false for black

      • resetMoving

        public void resetMoving()
        Changes the moving piece state values to ones that reflect that there is not piece currently moving/selected

        public void setDefault()
        Sets the board to the default setup for chess

      • newMoveEnabling

        public void newMoveEnabling()
        Enables and disables the board for use, depending on whether a square contains a piece

      • moveToLocation

        public void moveToLocation(Square destination)
        Moves the currently selected piece to the location in destination. The sprite in the current location is nullified and the destination gains the new sprite If a piece is captured, it is moved to the graveyard If a pawn is to be queened, it brings a modality panel
        Parameters:
        destination - the place on the board where the selected piece will move to

      • setupForMove

        public void setupForMove(Square pieceMoving)
        Takes a parameter of a Square and selects it, showing the legal moves that it can make (enabled the board in those places)
        Parameters:
        pieceMoving - The square containing the piece that is moving

      • queenPiece

        public void queenPiece(Square s)
        Brings up a modality panel where the user can choose what piece they would like to make the pawn being queened into
        Parameters:
        s - A square containing a piece to be queened (should be a pawn, but works with other types)

      • isInRow

        public boolean isInRow(Square s,
                       int row)
        Checks if the Square s is in the row row on the board
        Parameters:
        s - the square to see if it is in the specified row
        row - the row to see if the square is in
        Returns:
        true if the row contains the square, false otherwise.

      • putsInCheck

        public static boolean putsInCheck(Square origin,
                                  Square destination,
                                  Square[][] board)
        Checks if a move puts the king in check
        Parameters:
        origin - the square that the piece is moving from Precondition: The piece in the origin square must not be null (returns false if it is)
        destination - the square that the piece is moving into
        board - the board that both origin and destination lie on
        Returns:
        true if the king would be put in check by the move, false otherwise

      • putsInCheck

        public static boolean putsInCheck(Square origin,
                                  Square[][] board)
        Checks if the current position of a piece is putting the king in check
        Parameters:
        origin - the square that the piece to check if it is putting the king in check
        board - the board that the Square origin lies on
        Returns:
        true if the king is being put in check by the piece, false otherwise

      • isKingInCheck

        public static boolean isKingInCheck(boolean isTurnWhite,
                                    Square[][] board)
        Checks to see if any piece is putting the king in check
        Parameters:
        isTurnWhite - the current turn color, true for white, false for black
        board - the board to check if the king of color isTurnWhite is in check
        Returns:
        true if the king is in check, false otherwise

      • takesOutOfCheck

        public static boolean takesOutOfCheck(Square origin,
                                      Square destination,
                                      Square[][] board)
        Checks if the hypothetical move from Square origin to Square destination takes the king out of check If the method returns false, that would mean the piece is putting or puts the king into check. The method moves the piece in origin to destination and calls isKingInCheck, returning the opposite value Before returning, the method switches the pieces back to where they were
        Parameters:
        origin - the starting point of the piece
        destination - the ending point of the piece
        board - the board that the pieces/squares reside on
        Returns:
        true if the move takes the king out of check, false otherwise

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(Square pieceMoving)
        Checks if the piece specified in pieceMoving has any legal moves
        Parameters:
        pieceMoving - the piece that is to be tested for its ability to move
        Returns:
        true if the piece has possible moves, false otherwise

      • isCheckmate

        public boolean isCheckmate()
        Checks if the side on the current move is in checkmate
        Returns:
        true if checkmate, false otherwise

      • isStalemate

        public boolean isStalemate()
        Checks if the side on the current move is in stalemate.
        Returns:
        true if stalemate, false otherwise
